The Say Yes program was launched in Buff: and the first graduates eligible for the program graduated in 2013.
The city school district recorded a 46: 8% four-year graduation rate through June of the 2011-2012 school year, which increased to 53.4% in 2013, the first year graduates were eligible for the program.
The district had a 61: 7% graduation rate through June 2016, and when August graduates were included, the rate reached 64%.
